Question: Shiseido Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shiseido Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlights:

- Shiseido announces the launch of its new brand, SHISEIDO BEAUTY WELLNESS, focusing on inner beauty and wellness products
- Joint research and development with TSUMURA & CO. and Kagome Co., Ltd. for new beauty solutions
- SBW aims to offer "J-Beauty Wellness" by bringing harmony to the skin, body, and mind
- The brand will be launched in Japan in February 2024 and in the Asian market, including China, from 2025
- Shiseido aspires to position itself as a "Personal Beauty Wellness Company" by 2030, creating a sustainable world through the fusion of beauty and wellness
